dosageInstruction.text: Take 10 mg by mouth every night., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 10 mg by mouth every night.

dosageInstruction.text: Chew 12.5 mg every 6 (six) hours if needed for allergies., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Chew 12.5 mg every 6 (six) hours if needed for allergies.

dosageInstruction.text: Administer 1 drop into both eyes 2 (two) times a day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Administer 1 drop into both eyes 2 (two) times a day.

dosageInstruction.text: Take 5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Take 5 mg by mouth 1 (one) time each day.

dosageInstruction.text: Administer 1 spray into each nostril 1 (one) time each day., Historical Med
dosageInstruction.patientInstruction: Administer 1 spray into each nostril 1 (one) time each day.
